data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Nagios is a network monitoring tool: http://www.nagios.org

    This module is very useful in reusing the information that takes a
    lot and time and effort to enter into Nagios.

    I'm requiring creation of the Nagios rootlevel namespace simply
    because it does not yet exist. Apparently the discussion about the
    rootlevel namespace has already taken place here:

    http://www.mail-archive.com/modules@perl.org/msg19030.html
